channel.title: [PI] How to change equiptment location?
channel.description: How do you change a item from being a 'default' weapon to being a shield? I went into Item.java where I thought this action was done and I added it to this section: [code]public static boolean playerShield(int itemId) {[/code] But it still does not load as a shield when I compile and login. Could somebody give me assistance please?

item.title: [PI] How to change equiptment location?
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:2, topic:463894”]Itemassistant wearItem:

switch (wearID) { case itemId: targetSlot = targetSlot; break; }[/quote]
OHH! I completely overlooked that, thank you so much.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to change equiptment location?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Itemassistant wearItem:

switch (wearID) { case itemId: targetSlot = targetSlot; break; }

Read full topic
